thread.title: Reuben Schultz
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Reuben Schultz

author: Reuben Schultz
title: Reuben Schultz
text:
We had an easy time at the store and received lots of help from the sales staff (Thomas). He helped us make the decision and get set up for the next day delivery! The delivery team was very nice and quick to get the couches in and set up!
Thank you Gardener-White
